item.title: Asciidoc
item.description: asciidoctor asciidoctor Table of Contents mathjax ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting a2s vega vegalite mermaid bpmn nomnoml There are things to note! mathjax \(E = mc^2\) \[\begin{equation} x^2 + y^2 = z^2 \label{eq:sample} \end{equation}\] This is a reference to the equation above \(\eqref{eq:sample}\). ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting app.
